channel.title: Changing the follwing
channel.description:
1. were u spawn when i die 2. where i spwan when i first start the server
plz tell me what file these are in and what to look for ty

item.title: Changing the follwing
item.dc:creator: @silabgarza silabgarza
item.description:
@silabgarza wrote:

  1. for the death
    check your death method where it says “oh dear you have died” you should see teleportToX = #### and teleportToY = ####

  2. when u first start, look at the new player void in player.class
    or u can just add teleport(x, y, 0); to the starter package, would be cheap but incorrect, should be in player.java tho

Read full topic

item.title: Changing the follwing
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

317?

  1. search the coords in which you are teleported to when you die; then change them.
  2. search the coords in which you start at player or client class
